name: Bingo! Customizable with Google Sheets Sync Plug-in
description:
Bingo is such a fun, versatile game to play with friends and family. In this file, using the "Google Sheets Sync" plug-in, you can easily input any bingo items you would like (not just numbers!). Customize the colors, font, and overall page design to fit different themes.


Some suggestions: Road Trip Bingo, Holiday party Bingo, TV Show Bingo


In-depth Instructions included within the file!


Example: I used this template to create The Amazing Race Bingo Challenge (because I'm a superfan of that show). Check it out to explore even more possibilities of what you can create with this!
